div.p:
Starting with Odoo version 9.0, there are two offerings, namely Community and Enterprise. We get a lot of questions regarding the differences between Odoo
Enterprise and Odoo Community from our partners, customers and prospective
customers.

Odoo Community version is the base of everything. With every version, changes will
be tested and improved upon in the Community version and later pushed to the
Enterprise version. Odoo Community version is very important and it’s the
backbone of Odoo as explained by CEO of Odoo Fabien Pinckaers.
The main differences when it comes to Odoo 9.0 Enterprise are:

It’s not an understatement to say that Odoo 9.0 Enterprise has one of the best user
interfaces. This makes it stand out from SAP, Netsuite, Microsoft Dynamics, etc. The
fully responsive material design using Google material design guidelines is a
pleasure to work with. It gives a feeling of mobile phone apps when it comes to
usability of modules.

We always hear questions from US customers regarding the PDF reports and the
lack of ability to view drilled down accounting reports like P&L statements. Odoo
listened to what the customer’s expectations are and executed it in a beautiful way.
It’s easy to generate reports, customize templates, and much more.

For customers moving from
previous versions of Odoo to Odoo 9 Enterprise, Odoo will provide a free core
database migration. Treming, being an Odoo Ready Partner, will work with Odoo to
make the up gradation smooth and easy. Any custom modules that already exist will
be migrated by the Treming Odoo team for a fixed cost after estimation. As a Ready Partner we can procure Odoo licenses for our customers for the
best market rates.
